data.event: First settlers in Medina were Zebediah Hyde; Lewis Hyde and Alva McCrary; and Samuel Young and sons, who arrived in 1848.

event.title: was changed to Medina prior to 1851

data.event: The name was changed to Medina prior to 1851.
A post office called Medina was established in 1852, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1966.
